author: TenPlus1

game.author: Minetest
game.name: minetest_game
game.short_description: The classic "Minetest". A lightweight and well-maintained base for modding
game.title: Minetest Game

long_description:
Adds some new player effects:

- Slow down player when walking on snow.
- Speed up player when walking on ice.
- Hurt player when touching cactus.
- Suffocate player when head is inside a solid block.
- Add node check for on_walk_over function.
- Setting to enable old sneak glitch.
- Enable player knockback when hurt (has setting to disable).
name: playerplus
short_description: Adds effects to player to change speeds, cause damage, knockback and more...
title: Player Plus Mod
